scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a photograph, n.d. of Nicholas Vachel Lindsay and his mother, Catharine (Frazee) Lindsay; and a printed Stanza(PCS), n.y. Nov, "To the young men of Illinois" from the poem, "Litany of the Heroes" by Nicholas Vachel Lindsay, signed by the author, with a printed message on the verso from H. N. Hansen concerning a talk by Lindsay on "The Negro" as part of the Lindsay Lecture Course.
